articles.author: Jana Randow, Craig Stirling
articles.title: Europe's Motor Just Veered Into a Post-Pandemic Ditch - Bloomberg
articles.description: The full extent of Germany’s industrial decline in 2023 will be revealed in the coming week with a raft of data that’s likely to hit a new post-pandemic low.
articles.content:

articles.title: Measles outbreak: Adults warned of catching 'dangerous' illness as risks are higher in older people - GB News
